label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Purgeno longer deals bonus damage tosummonedunits
  • Fixed the following passive abilities not being disabled byBreak:Nethertoxin,Tidebringer,Essence Aura,Hunter in the Night,Poison Sting, andneutralability passives

label: Abaddon
descriptionHtml:
• Mist Coilcooldown reduced from 5 to 4.5
  • Borrowed TimeAghanim's Scepter damage redirection increased from 35% to 50%

label: Alchemist
descriptionHtml:
• Acid Spraydamage increased from 12/16/20/24 to 15/20/25/30
  • Greevil's GreedBounty Runebonus increased from 4× to 5×

label: Ancient Apparition
descriptionHtml: • Cold Feetcast range increased from 700 to 700/800/900/1000

label: Anti-Mage
descriptionHtml:
• Blinkdistance rescaled from 1000/1075/1150/1150 to 925/1000/1075/1150
  • Mana Voidstunrescaled from 0.1/0.2/0.3 to 0.15

label: Bane
descriptionHtml:
• Enfeeblecooldown reduced from 10 to 8
  • Brain Sapmana cost reduced from 100/125/150/175 to 70/100/130/160
  • FixedFiend's Gripsometimes not grantingTrue Sightover the target properly

label: Batrider
descriptionHtml:
• Flamebreakdamage over time reduced from 50 per second to 25/30/35/40
  • Flamebreak damage duration increased from 1/2/3/4 to 3/4/5/6
  • AddedAghanim's Scepterupgrade:
    • Flaming Lassograbs its target, as well as the target's nearest allied hero within 400 range
    • The secondary target is tethered to the first
    • Also causes Lasso to deal 100 damage per second

label: Bloodseeker
descriptionHtml:
• Thirstscaling changed from 100%➜25% to 75%➜25%
  • Bloodrageheal reduced from 25% to 19/21/23/25%

label: Bounty Hunter
descriptionHtml:
• Tracknow provides vision only of the target rather than the area around it
  • Track allied bonus gold reduced from 50/100/150 to 40/80/120

label: Brewmaster
descriptionHtml:
• Primal SplitStorm'sDispel Magicarea of effect increased from 200 to 600
  • Primal Split Storm's Dispel Magic cooldown reduced from 8 to 6 seconds
  • Primal SplitEarth'sHurl Bouldercooldown reduced from 7 to 5 seconds

label: Bristleback
descriptionHtml: • Quill Spraydamage threshold reduced from 250 to 230

label: Centaur Warrunner
descriptionHtml: • Returnstrengthas bonus damage increased from 26/34/42/50% to 30/42/54/66%

label: Chaos Knight
descriptionHtml:
• Chaos Strikenow lowers the target'sarmorby 5 for 8 seconds whenever it crits

    (Applies before the damage happens, likeDesolator. Can be applied byillusions, but multiple instances do not stack. Only triggers when Chaos Strike triggers.)
  • Chaos Strike critical damage reduced from 150/200/250/300% to 125/175/225/275%

label: Chen
descriptionHtml:
• Penitenceslow/damage amplification increased from 14/18/22/26% to 15/20/25/30%
  • Test of Faith(Damage) mana cost reduced from 175 to 90/100/110/120
  • Test of Faith (Damage) cooldown reduced from 24 to 16

label: Clinkz
descriptionHtml: • Strafecooldown reduced from 45/40/35/30 to 40/35/30/25

label: Crystal Maiden
descriptionHtml: • Crystal Novacooldown reduced from 15 to 13

label: Dark Seer
descriptionHtml: • Baseintelligencereduced by 2

label: Dazzle
descriptionHtml: • Poison Touchmana cost reduced from 100/115/130/145 to 100

label: Death Prophet
descriptionHtml: • Exorcismspirits increased from 6/13/21 to 8/14/21

label: Disruptor
descriptionHtml:
• Thunder Strikecooldown reduced from 16 to 12/11/10/9
  • Thunder Strike now only provides vision over the target itself

label: Doom
descriptionHtml:
• Scorched Earthdamage/heal increased from 12/18/24/30 to 12/24/36/48
  • LVL? Deathcooldown reduced from 8 to 7

label: Dragon Knight
descriptionHtml: • Breathe Firedebuff duration increased from 8 to 11 seconds

label: Drow Ranger
descriptionHtml:
• Precision Aurabonus damage increased from 18/24/30/36% to 20/26/32/38%
  • Precision Aura cooldown reduced from 120 to 100

label: Earth Spirit
descriptionHtml: • Stone Remnantis now placed in front of you when double-clicking it

label: Earthshaker
descriptionHtml: • Fissuredamage reduced from 125/175/225/275 to 110/160/210/260

label: Elder Titan
descriptionHtml:
• Echo Stomparea of effect increased from 475 to 500
  • Ancestral Spiritmana cost rescaled from 110 to 80/90/100/110
  • Ancestral Spirit attack damage per creep increased from 3/6/9/12 to 6/9/12/15
  • Natural Orderaura sticky duration increased from 0.5 to 1

label: Enchantress
descriptionHtml:
• Nature's Attendantswisp count increased from 3/5/7/9 to 4/6/8/10
  • Impetusis no longer aUnique Attack Modifier

label: Enigma
descriptionHtml:
• Midnight Pulsecast time reduced from 0.2 to 0.1
  • Midnight Pulse area of effect reduced from 600 to 550
  • Black Holeradius increased from 400 to 420

label: Gyrocopter
descriptionHtml:
• Rocket Barragedamage per rocket reduced from 8/13/18/23 to 7/12/17/22

    (Total damage reduced from 240/390/540/690 to 210/360/510/660)
  • Call Downslow no longer piercesSpell Immunity

label: Huskar
descriptionHtml: • Berserker's BloodMagic Resistance per stack reduced from 4/5/6/7 to 3/4/5/6

label: Invoker
descriptionHtml:
• Intelligence growth increased from 3.2 to 4
  • Alacrityspeed/damage bonus increased from 20➜80 to 30➜90
  • Aghanim's Scepter now adds one level to the stats provided byQuas,Wex, andExorton allInvokedspells
  • Max levelDeafening Blastnow retains its normal location targeting UI

    (Rather than it being changed to ano targetcast at a certain level. This does not affect how the ability itself works.)

label: Jakiro
descriptionHtml:
• Dual Breath's fiery wave now moves at the same speed as its icy wave: 850 to 1050
  • Dual Breath damage increased from 16/26/56/76 to 20/40/60/80
  • Ice Pathrange increased from 1100 to 1200

label: Juggernaut
descriptionHtml: • Blade Furydamage increased from 80/100/120/140 to 80/105/130/155

label: Keeper of the Light
descriptionHtml: • Chakra Magicspell cooldown reduction increased from 1/2/3/4 to 2/3/4/5

label: Kunkka
descriptionHtml:
• Tidebringerdamage increased from 15/30/45/60 to 20/35/50/65
  • X Marks the Spotcast range rescaled from 350/550/750/1000 to 400/600/800/1000
  • X Marks the Spot cooldown rescaled from 19/16/13/10 to 26/20/14/8
  • Ghost Shipcast point reduced from 0.4 to 0.3

label: Legion Commander
descriptionHtml:
• Base damage increased by 4
  • Overwhelming Oddscooldown reduced from 18 to 15
  • Press The Attackcast time reduced from 0.3 to 0.2
  • Fixed Legion Commander sometimes auto-attacking nearby units afterDuelends instead of continuing to attack the dueled target

label: Leshrac
descriptionHtml:
• Base damage reduced by 4
  • Lightning Stormjump distance reduced from 650 to 475
  • Lightning Storm damage reduced from 80/140/200/260 to 50/100/150/200

label: Lich
descriptionHtml:
• Sacrificeno longer splits XP with enemies
  • Chain Frostprojectile speed increased from 750 to 850
  • Chain Frost attack speed slow increased from 20 to 30 (Now matches move speed slow)

label: Lifestealer
descriptionHtml:
• Ragecooldown reduced from 19 to 16
  • InfestandControlcan now be used onAncient Creeps

label: Lina
descriptionHtml:
• Light Strike Arraydamage reduced from 120/160/200/240 to 80/120/160/200
  • Laguna Bladedamage reduced from 450/675/950 to 450/650/850

label: Lion
descriptionHtml: • Finger of DeathAghanim's Scepter upgrade area of effect increased from 200 to 300

label: Lone Druid
descriptionHtml:
• Summon Spirit Bearcooldown reduced from 180/160/140/120 to 120
  • Battle Crybonus damage increased from 60/90/120 to 90/120/150
  • Battle Cry bonusarmorincreased from 6/12/18 to 10/15/20

label: Luna
descriptionHtml:
• Strengthgain increased from 1.9 to 2.2
  • Eclipsecooldown reduced from 160/150/140 to 140
  • Eclipse Aghanim's Scepter beam count increased from 6/10/14 to 6/12/18

label: Lycan
descriptionHtml:
• Strengthgain increased from 2.75 to 3
  • Shapeshiftcritical strike chance increased from 30% to 30/35/40%

label: Magnus
descriptionHtml: • Empowercooldown reduced from 12 to 8

label: Medusa
descriptionHtml: • Mystic Snakedamage and mana steal boost per jump increased from 25% to 35%

label: Mirana
descriptionHtml:
• Agilitygrowth from increased 2.75 to 3.3
  • Starstormsecondary strike search radius increased from 325 to 425

label: Morphling
descriptionHtml:
• Agilitygrowth increased from 3 to 3.4
  • Adaptive Strikedamage rescaled from 20/40/60/80 to 50/60/70/80
  • Hybridno longer hides Morphling or restricts its usage when aReplicateis out
  • Hybrids are visibly known to enemies

    (Similar toDark Seer'sWall of Replicaillusions)

label: Naga Siren
descriptionHtml:
• Rip Tidedamage rescaled from 130/160/190/220 to 100/140/180/220
  • Song of the SirenAghanim's Scepter heal increased from 6% to 8%

label: Nature's Prophet
descriptionHtml:
• Sproutcast time reduced from 0.5 to 0.35
  • Sprout mana cost reduced from 100/120/140/160 to 70/90/110/130
  • Nature's CallTreantsmovement speed increased from 300 to 325
  • Nature's Call Treants vision reduced from 1200 to 1000
  • Greater TreantBase Attack Time reduced from 1.75 to 1
  • Wrath of NatureAghanim's Scepter now applies a 4 second buff on the units it hits, which will spawn the extra treant if the unit dies during that time

label: Necrophos
descriptionHtml:
• Death Pulsedamage increased from 75/125/200/275 to 125/175/225/275
  • Heartstopper Aurano longer affectsancient creeps
  • Sadisthealth regen increased from 1/2/3/4 to 1/2/3/6
  • Sadist mana regen increased from 2/4/6/10 to 2/4/6/12

label: Night Stalker
descriptionHtml: • Base health regen increased from 0.25 to 2

label: Nyx Assassin
descriptionHtml:
• BurrowImpalecooldown reduced from 9 to 7
  • Burrow Impale andMana Burnbonus range increased from 50% to 75%
  • Vendettaduration increased from 25/35/50 to 40/50/60

label: Ogre Magi
descriptionHtml:
• Base armor increased by 1
  • Bloodlustattack speed bonus increased from 20/30/40/50 to 30/40/50/60
  • Bloodlust can now be cast ontowers
  • FixedMulticastBloodlust not affecting nearbySpell Immuneallies

    (Could already target them directly)

label: Omniknight
descriptionHtml:
• Purificationcast point reduced from 0.4 to 0.25
  • Degen Aurastickiness reduced from 2 to 1

label: Oracle
descriptionHtml:
• Fortune's Endcast time reduced from 0.3 to 0
  • Fortune's End cast range increased from 650 to 850
  • Fortune's End radius increased from 215 to 300
  • Fortune's End damage rescaled from 75/150/225/300 to 90/120/150/180
  • Fortune's End cooldown rescaled from 12 to 15/12/9/6
  • Fate's Edictno longer amplifies incoming non-magical damage
  • Fate's Edict now has normalpurgabilityrules
  • Purifying Flamescooldown reduced from 2.5 to 2.25

label: Outworld Devourer
descriptionHtml:
• Strengthgain increased from 1.85 to 2.3
  • Sanity's Eclipsenow always removes 40% of affected heroes' max mana

    (Instead of 75% of current mana only when under the threshold)
  • Sanity's Eclipse mana loss no longer piercesSpell Immunity

    (Matches its damage behavior)
  • Sanity's Eclipse cast range increased from 600/650/700 to 700
  • Sanity's Eclipse cast range is no longer increased with Aghanim's Scepter

label: Phantom Assassin
descriptionHtml:
• Stifling Daggernow applies your attack's on-hit effects

    (Does not guarantee a proc if the effect is chance-based)
  • Blurno longer has a 0.75 second delay

label: Phantom Lancer
descriptionHtml:
• Agilitygrowth reduced from 3 to 2.6
  • Doppelgangercast time increased from 0 to 0.1

label: Phoenix
descriptionHtml:
• Sun Raymax health damage per second increased from 1/2/3/4% to 1.25/2.5/3.75/5%

    (Heal per second is half these values)

label: Puck
descriptionHtml:
• Illusory Orbspeed increased from 600 to 650

    (Travel distance increased from 1800 to 1950 to keep the total duration the orb is alive the same)
  • Illusory Orb cooldown reduced from 12 to 11 seconds
  • Dream Coilcooldown reduced from 85 to 75

label: Pudge
descriptionHtml:
• Rotdamage rescaled from 35/60/85/110 to 30/60/90/120
  • Rot move slow increased from 20/22/24/26% to 27%

label: Pugna
descriptionHtml:
• Basemovement speedincreased from 320 to 330
  • Nether Wardis now placed at the target location using a 150 cast range ability

    (Instead of placing 150 units in front of his facing direction. Using double click will immediately place it in front of you.)
  • Life Draindamage/steal per second increased from 150/185/220 to 150/200/250

label: Queen of Pain
descriptionHtml: • Sonic Wavedamage reduced from 290/390/490 to 290/380/470 (Aghanim's Scepter damage reduced from 325/450/575 to 325/440/555)

label: Razor
descriptionHtml: • Static Linknow drains damage smoothly over its duration rather than every second

label: Riki
descriptionHtml: • Permanent Invisibilityhealth regen increased from 4/5/6/7 to 6/8/10/12

label: Sand King
descriptionHtml:
• Caustic Finaledebuff expire damage increased from 30% to 50%
  • Caustic Finale debuff slow increased from 20% to 25%

label: Shadow Demon
descriptionHtml: • Shadow Poisoncooldown reduced from 2.75 to 2.5

label: Shadow Shaman
descriptionHtml:
• Shacklescooldown reduced from 16 to 10
  • Shackles total damage increased from 120/160/160/200 to 120/180/240/300

label: Silencer
descriptionHtml: • FixedLast Wordcountdown debuff not beingpurgeable

label: Skywrath Mage
descriptionHtml:
• Concussive Shotcooldown reduced from 20/18/16/14 to 18/16/14/12
  • Mystic Flareno longer splits its damage overSpell Immuneheroes

label: Slardar
descriptionHtml:
• Sprintnow providesphasedmovement
  • Sprint cooldown reduced from 23 to 17
  • Sprint duration reduced from 16 to 12

label: Sniper
descriptionHtml: • Shrapneldelay reduced from 1.4 to 1.2 seconds

label: Spectre
descriptionHtml:
• Desolatenow works on non-hero units if they are alone
  • Dispersionnow reflects damage before reductions and returns it as the same damage type

    (Rather than asPuredamage after reduction)

label: Spirit Breaker
descriptionHtml: • Greater Bashnow uses pseudo random chance

label: Storm Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Static Remnantmana cost increased from 70/80/90/100 to 100
  • Static Remnant unobstructed vision reduced from 800 to 600
  • Ball Lightningbase mana cost increased from 15 + 7% to 30 + 8%

label: Sven
descriptionHtml:
• Baseintelligenceincreased by 2
  • Great Cleavedamage increased from 20/35/50/65 to 30/42/54/66%

label: Techies
descriptionHtml:
• Techies' mines are no longer triggered when destroyed
  • Techies' mines can now be destroyed usingQuelling Blade/Battle Fury

    (Same range as wards: 450)
  • Techies' mines now provide 10Goldfor destroying them
  • Land Minescooldown and mana cost reduced by 50%
  • Land Mines damage reduced by 50%

  • Land Mines no longer have a max count
  • Land Mines andStasis Trapsno longer blockneutralspawns
  • Land Mines no longer stack exactly on top of each other

    (They can still be very close though)

label: Terrorblade
descriptionHtml:
• Temporarily removed fromCaptains Mode
  • Reflectionnow affects all enemy heroes in a 900 area of effect

    (Will not affect units that are infogor who areinvisible)
  • Reflection attack and moveslowreduced from 60% to 25%
  • Reflection cooldown rescaled from 22/18/14/10 to 22/20/18/16
  • Conjure Imageillusionsare known as illusions to enemies

    (Similar toDark Seer'sWall of Replicaillusions)
  • Conjure Image cast point reduced from 0.5 to 0.15
  • Metamorphosisnow emits a 900 range aura that affects his nearby illusions, causing them to match his current form
  • Sundercast range increased from 325 to 550
  • Sunder minimum health increased from 20% to 25%

label: Tidehunter
descriptionHtml: • Gusharmor reduction increased from 2/3/4/5 to 3/4/5/6

label: Timbersaw
descriptionHtml: • Whirling Deathcooldown reduced from 8 to 6

label: Tinker
descriptionHtml: • Rearmchannel time reduced from 3/2/1 to 3/1.5/0.75

label: Tiny
descriptionHtml:
• Basestrengthincreased from 24 to 26
  • Baseintelligenceincreased from 14 to 17

label: Treant Protector
descriptionHtml: • Leech Seedmana cost reduced from 140 to 100/110/120/130

label: Troll Warlord
descriptionHtml: • Fervorattack speed per stack increased from 16/22/28/34 to 20/25/30/35

label: Tusk
descriptionHtml:
• Ice Shardsmana cost increased from 90 to 100/105/110/115
  • Snowballmax launch time reduced from 4 to 3 seconds
  • Frozen Sigilno longer goes throughSpell Immunity
  • Aghanim's ScepterWalrus Kicknow deals 200 damage

label: Undying
descriptionHtml:
• Aghanim's Scepter no longer improvesFlesh Golem

    (Previously it increased damage amplification and heal)
  • Aghanim's Scepter now increasesDecay's strength steal from 4 to 10
  • TombstoneZombiesattack damage reduced from 41 to 35
  • Tombstone now requires a constant number of attacks to be destroyed: 3/4/5/7 from heroes

    (6/8/10/14 attacks from creeps)
  • Soul Ripcan now restore 1/2/3/4 health to Tombstone

label: Ursa
descriptionHtml:
• Strengthgain reduced from 2.9 to 2.7
  • Earthshockcooldown reduced from 6 to 5
  • Enragefury swipes multiplier reduced from 1.5/2/2.5 to 1.5/1.75/2
  • Enrage cooldown reduced from 50/45/40 to 50/40/30

label: Vengeful Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Agilitygain increased from 2.8 to 3.3
  • Basemovement speedincreased from 295 to 300

label: Venomancer
descriptionHtml:
• Poison Stingdamage increased from 5/10/15/20 to 6/12/18/24
  • Poison Sting now works normally onillusions
  • Poison Novadamage per second reduced from 36/58/81 to 30/55/80
    (Aghanim's Scepter damage per second increased from 58/81/108 to 60/85/110)
  • Poison Nova duration increased from 12/14/15/16 to 16

    (Duration is no longer increased by Aghanim's Scepter)

label: Viper
descriptionHtml:
• Agilitygrowth increased from 2.5 to 2.9
  • Corrosive Skinslow no longer piercesSpell Immunity

label: Visage
descriptionHtml: • Familiar'sStone Formarea of effect increased from 325 to 340

label: Warlock
descriptionHtml: • Golemscan no longer be destroyed byPurge

label: Weaver
descriptionHtml:
• The Swarmmana cost rescaled from 100 to 70/80/90/100
  • The Swarm cooldown reduced from 36/33/30/27 to 35/30/25/20

label: Winter Wyvern
descriptionHtml: • Winter's Curseno longer affectsSpell Immuneenemies in the area, but it still affects the primary target

label: Witch Doctor
descriptionHtml:
• Death Warddamage increased from 60/90/120 to 60/105/150

    (Scepter now deals the same damage)
  • Death Ward no longer bounces once at level 3

    (Still bounces 4 times with Scepter)

label: Wraith King
descriptionHtml:
• Base damage increased by 7
  • Vampiric Auradoes not show the healing effect if Wraith King is in the fog of war or is invisible to the enemy
  • ReincarnationAghanim's Scepter ally death delay increased from 5 to 7 seconds
  • Reincarnation Aghanim's Scepter ally wraith aura now remains active during Reincarnation

label: Aegis of the Immortal
descriptionHtml:
• Aegis now provides temporaryground visionnear your death area while reincarnating

    (Similar toWraith King'sReincarnation)

label: Battle Fury
descriptionHtml: • Chop cooldown reduced from 5 to 4 seconds (same forQuelling Blade)

label: Bloodstone
descriptionHtml:
• Respawn time reduction reduced from 4 per charge to 3 per charge
  • Bloodstone no longer reducesgoldlost on death
  • Bloodstone no longer grants vision/experience where its owner died

label: Bottle
descriptionHtml: • Health/mana restore reduced from 135/70 to 110/70

label: Crimson Guard
descriptionHtml: • Recipecost reduced from 825 to 600

label: Diffusal Blade
descriptionHtml: • Purgecooldown reduced from 8 to 0

label: Drum of Endurance
descriptionHtml: • Enduranceactive buff increased from 20 to 25 bonusattack speed

label: Dust of Appearance
descriptionHtml: • Cooldown reduced from 60 to 30

label: Enchanted Mango
descriptionHtml:
• Cost reduced from 150 to 125
  • Cast range increased from 250 to 400

label: Ethereal Blade
descriptionHtml: • Ether Blastcooldown reduced from 30 to 20

label: Eul's Scepter of Divinity
descriptionHtml: • Cyclonecast range reduced from 700 to 575

label: Guardian Greaves
descriptionHtml: • Mendcooldown reduced from 45 to 40

label: Glimmer Cape
descriptionHtml:
• Glimmerfade time increased from 0.4 to 0.6
  • Glimmer buff is nowpurgeable
  • Glimmer buffmagic resistancereduced from 55 to 45%
  • Glimmer buff cast range reduced from 900 to 800
  • Glimmer buff mana cost reduced from 130 to 110
  • Glimmer visual effect on initial cast is now more obvious

label: Heart of Tarrasque
descriptionHtml: • Health restore per second increased from 3.25 to 4%

label: Heaven's Halberd
descriptionHtml: • Can now bedisassembled

label: Helm of the Dominator
descriptionHtml:
• Now sets theDominatedunit's health to a minimum of 1400

    (If the Dominated unit's base health is higher than the minimum, its health will not be changed)

label: Helm of Iron Will
descriptionHtml: • Cost reduced from 950 to 900

label: Lotus Orb
descriptionHtml:

  • Echo Shell cooldown reduced from 17 to 15

label: Manta Style
descriptionHtml:
• Mirror Imagerange/melee cooldown reduced from 50/35 to 45/30
  • Mirror Image mana cost reduced from 165 to 125

label: Medallion of Courage
descriptionHtml:
• Can no longer targetSpell Immuneenemies
  • Reduces armor values by half againstRoshan

label: Solar Crest
descriptionHtml:
• Evasionand miss chance reduced from 30% to 25%
  • Can no longer targetSpell Immuneenemies
  • Reduces armor values by half againstRoshan

label: Mjollnir
descriptionHtml: • Chain Lightningtargets count increased from 8 to 12

label: Moon Shard
descriptionHtml: • No longer requires arecipe

label: Necronomicon

label: Octarine Core
descriptionHtml:

    (The stack limit was previously fixed to 45 seconds rather than the cooldown)

label: Pipe of Insight
descriptionHtml: • Insight Auranow works on the carrier

label: Phase Boots
descriptionHtml:
• Phaseduration reduced from 3.6 seconds to 2.5 seconds
  • Phase bonus speed increased from 16% to 24% for melee heroes, 20% for ranged

label: Power Treads
descriptionHtml: • Attack speedreduced from 30 to 25

label: Quelling Blade
descriptionHtml: • Chopcooldown reduced from 5 to 4 seconds (same forBattle Fury)

descriptionHtml: • Recipecost reduced from 1425 to 1350

descriptionHtml: • Cooldown reduced from 35 to 30
